name: thorntonlodge.co.nz
homepage_content: Thornton Lodge Motel - Waipukurau, New Zealand CHECK AVAILABILITY FIND THE BEST RATE WELCOME TO THORNTON LODGE MOTEL Your host C S Brar welcomes you to the Thornton Lodge Motel. Relax in one of our 16 spacious ground floor units, 5 of which were built in March 2020. All our units have heat pumps/air conditioning. All doors and windows that don't face the swimming pool have been double glazed with hush glass. Our new King Studio units have double glazing and are located at the rear of the complex. Enjoy our FREE unlimited high speed WiFi - a must for the traveller today. In summer relax by our large salt water swimming pool with your favorite drink or enjoy a barbeque outside of your unit. Soak up the amazing Central Hawkes Bay sun. All our units have Smart TVs â you can access your own Netflix account and come with Freeview and five Sky TV channels including Sport 1 & Sport 2. Thornton Lodge Motel is a short 10 minute walk to Waipukurau CBD. A great central stop off between Gisborne and Wellington. Rooms We have 11 spacious ground floor units comprising of one bedroom and studio units that have views to our large outdoor salt water swimming pool. Basic Studio Studio King Studio Family Unit (1-Bedroom) Family Unit (Accessible/1-Bedroom) Central Hawkes Bay/Waipukurau Central Hawke's Bay, with Waipukurau as its heart, serves as the Southern Gateway to the Hawke's Bay Region, making it the first stop for visitors arriving from Wellington, Wairarapa, and Manawatu. This area spans from the rugged slopes of the Ruahine Ranges in the west to the sandy shores of the Pacific Ocean in the east. It offers numerous opportunities for those looking to venture off the beaten path, with activities such as walking, cycling, and backcountry fishing among the many ways to explore at your own pace. Waipukurau is the largest town in Central Hawkes Bay and is set on the banks of the beautiful trout-laden Tukituki River on the East Coast of the North Island, and only a 10 minute drive from Waipawa. Waipukurau is reputed to be the only town in the world through which Latitute 40Â° South passes. View Rooms

Very clean & the spa was great after a big day riding! will most defiantly be booking again next year, highly recommend. accommodated our large group, close to town & places to eat. staff very friendly. @Brian B      TripAdvisor Read More Super hosts so friendly and helpful, Great unit, well equipped with good cooking facilities. Spotless and very tidy. Very close to shops and restaurants, which are just a few minutes away. Trips to the Cape and 90 mile beach arranged for you and pick up at the front of the motel. Pool, spa and BBQ all available on site. @samiez      TripAdvisor Read More Stayed here for 1 night in a deluxe queen studio (the renovated ones) the pictures online were exactly what we got. Large studio with nice comfy bed, kitchenette with everything you would need to self cater. Modern bathroom with stand alone walk in shower. Room was spotless and smelled fresh and clean. Short walk to the main shops and KFC right next door. I would highly recommend the Wayfarer to anyone. Previous Next Explore our gift shop & take home memories to last a lifetime Previous Next The Wayfarer Motel offers affordable accommodation in the Northland region of New Zealand, a great place to start your trip if you plan to visit the Cape Reinga Lighthouse, 90 Mile Beach, or wish to explore beautiful Te Tai Tokerau. We are a locally owned and operated motel situated in the heart of Kaitaia – we can’t wait to welcome you to your home away from home. Quick links Accomodation Kaitaia Gallery Book online Contact Policy Privacy policy

name: wolfrestaurant.co.nz
homepage_content: WOLF 0 Our Story Housed within Foxglove Bar & Kitchen on Wellington’s waterfront, sits WOLF. Inspired by New York’s opulent steak restaurants, WOLF by Foxglove is a contemporary and carnivorous twist on a traditional concept. The carefully curated menu celebrates the finest cuts of locally sourced New Zealand beef and sustainable seafood with a wide variety of signature sides perfectly designed to accompany your feast. Every dish has been developed to devour by head chef, Terry Morgan, with the help of the Foxglove kitchen team. Using state of the art meat aging processes, fierce flame-powered grills, and modern culinary techniques they’ve created a unique food offering like no other in Wellington. The cutting-edge food offering is matched with impeccable service, fine wines, and an extensive beverage selection, all in an inspired setting - creating a captivating culinary experience. Find Our Menu Here Reservations We offer A La Carte to groups of up to 12. For a larger group, please email us at wolf@foxglovebar.co.nz. Unfortunately, we cap our bookings at 20 covers. To ensure a relaxed and enjoyable atmosphere for all our guests, we kindly ask that children are not included in your dining plans with us. We appreciate your understanding. Contact Us Phone 04-460 9410 wolf@foxglovebar.co.nz Location 33 Queens Wharf, Wellington 6011 Hours: Sunday & Monday Closed Tuesday to Saturday 12pm - 2:30pm & 5:30pm Late

name: whangateauholidaypark.co.nz
homepage_content: Whangateau Holiday Park Kiwi Camping, As It Should Be Whangateau Holiday Park is kiwi camping as it should be, right on the water’s edge and only an hour's drive from central Auckland. Read More Arrival Date Number Of Nights Check Availability Whangateau Holiday Park is kiwi camping as it should be, right on the water’s edge and only an hours drive from central Auckland Ideal for family holidays or a stop-off on your campervan adventure on the Twin Coast Discover Highway to Northland. Conveniently close to Matakana and Leigh, you can explore the north Auckland coast at your leisure. We have plenty of waterfront and standard campsites and accommodation options for most budgets. Guests have full use of all park facilities including toilets, showers and communal kitchen. View All Accommodation Self-Contained Unit 2 Room Unit Waterfront Deluxe Cabin Family Cabins Waterfront Caravans Family Units Budget Units Campsites EV Charging Communal Kitchen Communal Bathroom Barbecue Area Recreational Gear Hire Laundry Facilities TV and Games Room Get close to nature, sit back, relax and unwind. Walk straight down onto the beach and enjoy safe swimming and water sports. Pack up the whanau and head on over to Whangateau Holiday Park, just an hour north of Auckland. We're right on the water's edge with stunning views of Whangateau Harbour. Chuck a line in, take a dip, or just chill out and soak up the sun. The kids will be sweet as with our playground and heaps of space to run around. Feeling peckish? Fire up the barbie or whip up a feast in our communal kitchen. If you're keen to explore, we're a stone's throw from Matakana, Goat Island Marine Reserve, and Tawharanui Regional Park. We've got a range of accommodation options to suit most budgets, from campsites to cosy cabins and even some cool retro caravans. So come on down, relax and enjoy the good vibes at Whangateau Holiday Park. Download Park Map On-Site Facilities Whangateau Holiday Park has a full range of modern facilities to make your stay comfortable and convenient. We pride ourselves in providing the cleanest facilities available. View All Facilities Kitchen Facilities The kitchen has modern facilities with freestanding ovens, ceramic hobs, microwaves, boiling water taps, toasters, fridges and freezers. Close to BBQs and covered outdoor dining area. We don’t provide pots, pans or any kitchen items. Kitchen baskets are available to hire from reception. Showers Our showers are coin operated and take a $1 coin, which lasts for 6 minutes. This helps conserve water and helps to reduce wait times at the busy times. BYO coins, or we have plenty of $1 coins to swap at reception. Two accessible family bathrooms are available, equipped with change table and baby bath. TV-Rec Room Relax in our TV and Recreation room with comfy couches, large screen TV with Freeview and DVD player, Camp Library/book exchange or battle it out on the Air Hockey Table ($2/game). DVD movies and board games are available to hire from Reception. BBQ Facilities Gas and charcoal BBQs are free to use during your stay. BBQ briquettes are available to purchase from Reception. Whangateau Holiday Park is the home of Smoke on the Coast BBQ competition held in late April each year. It’s the most fun, family orientated Barbecue competition and festival of smoke in NZ. Playground Our onsite fun playground awaits young adventurers! With swings, slides, climbing frames, and more there’s plenty to keep the kids entertained. The playground is open until sunset daily. Kayaks and Stand up Paddleboards Explore Whangateau harbour by kayak or stand up paddleboard (SUP). Single and double sit on kayaks and paddleboards are available to hire from reception. Pedal Carts Getting behind the wheel of one of our pedal cars is a great way to explore the Holiday Park. Available to hire from reception Monday to Saturday 9am to 4pm and Sundays 12 to 4pm. Helmets are provided. Outdoor Giant Chess Show off your strategic skills and play on our larger-than-life outdoor chess set. Challenge friends and family to a battle of wits in an outdoor setting. Ideal location Ideal for family holidays or a stop-off on your campervan adventure on the Twin Coast Discovery Highway to Northland. Conveniently close to Matakana, Leigh and Goat Island, you can explore the north Auckland coast at your leisure. We have plenty of waterfront and standard campsites and accommodation for most budgets. Our team will help ensure that your holiday experience is everything you would expect and more. Get Directions Things to do / Local Area Whangateau Holiday Park is your gateway to a rejuvenating holiday filled with natural beauty and coastal charm. Explore the calm harbour waters by kayak or paddleboard, discover an abundance of birdlife, or cast a line for a relaxing fishing experience. Beyond the park, explore nearby Goat Island Marine Reserve, the charming Matakana markets, or enjoy scenic walks. View All Activities Leigh and Goat Island Leigh Is a scenic coastal village less than 10 minutes from Whangateau Holiday Park. Known for its stunning marine life, beautiful beaches and laid-back atmosphere, it’s a must visit for nature lovers and outdoor enthusiasts. At Goat Island Marine Reserve, New Zealand’s first marine reserve, you can snorkel or dive amongst vibrant fish, stingrays and even the occasional dolphin. Glass bottom boat tours are available for those who prefer to stay dry. The Marine Discovery Centre is well worth a visit Nearby, Matheson Bay is great for swimming, while Leigh harbour and Ti Point are favourites for fishing and boating. Ti Point Reptile Park will fascinate the kids. It’s home to New Zealand’s largest collection of reptiles, tuatara, turtles & exotic lizards. www.leighbythesea.co.nz Matakana Matakana is a charming and picturesque destination close to Whangateau Holiday Park. Nestled in a lush, rolling countryside its best known for its vibrant Saturday Farmers Market, boutique wineries and relaxed coastal atmosphere. The village offer a mix of artisan food, great eateries, local crafts, and boutique shopping making it a perfect place to visit. Local Beaches The Matakana coast is home to some of New Zealand’s most stunning and diverse beaches covering everything from golden sands and gentle swimming spots to rugged coastlines and surf-friendly waves. Enjoy the surf at Pakiri, Leigh or Omaha Beaches or sheltered swimming at Matheson Bay and in our beautiful harbour. Anchor Bay at Tawharanui Marine Reserve has soft white sand and turquoise waves, perfect for swimming surfing, and sunbathing. Walking Trails If you like walking, the region has lots of walking tracks that cover all kinds of terrain around the harbour, through native bush and forest, and along the beautiful beaches. Take the time to visit Tawharanui Regional Park, a breathtaking coastal and predator-free open sanctuary. It’s a haven for native wildlife including kiwi, takahe and saddleback birds. Well maintained walking tracks take visitors through diverse landscapes from wetlands and forests to dramatic coastal cliffs. “I love the friendly welcome, the beautifully kept gardens and the cleanliness with good quality equipment. Have stayed here on numerous occasions and always return because of the well-run immaculate facilities and very pleasant managers.” Whangateau Holiday Park Review "A clean well run camp in the centre of a vibrant region offering heaps for the traveller/ holiday maker to do. If you don't wish to do anything just sit back and relax and enjoy the view from a waterfront setting. We have been Whangateau camp visitors for 50 years and still enjoy returning there." Whangateau Holiday Park Review "We stayed at this holiday park over the Easter weekend and thoroughly enjoyed it. The caravan sites are all flat and the facilities very clean and tidy. The park has a family atmosphere and a lovely outlook over the estuary. We have been travelling in our caravan for the past year staying in many parks but this will definitely be one that we will return to." Whangateau Holiday Park Review Sign up for news and promotions Get inspired for your next escape - sign up now! All Rights Reserved. Developed by BlueOcean - The B2B Agency Client Login

name: thelostgypsy.com
homepage_content: The Lost Gypsy Skip to content The fantastic Cabinet of Obscurities Visiting The Catlins? Add The Lost Gypsy to your trip – A Fantastical Museum of Automata Art by Blair Somerville Find Us What is there to see? The Lost Gypsy has three parts; The Winding Thoughts Theatre (of sorts), the Bus, and the Coffee cart. Click here to see Blair & The Lost Gypsy The Winding Thoughts Theatre of sorts The Masterpieces This is it. The Winding Thoughts Theatre (of Sorts). This temple of tinkering houses Blair’s creations, together with automata art from around the globe. Walk through the gate, wander up the path and find a folly of fettling ready to be fiddled with. Wind handles, push buttons, and your curiosity will be rewarded. To get a feel of the place start with The Bus (free admission). Have a play with the smaller automata there and browse the shop. Then, buy your tickets ($10) and venture up the path into the world of Blair’s imagination. Hours of Operation Winter CLOSED Late April – late October Summer 10:00 AM – 5:00 PM Closed on Wednesdays Visit the Theatre The Green Bus Where the tinkering began In the beginning, there was … the bus. This 1951 Leyland house bus has undergone multiple transformations and at least 10 coats of paint since it was first parked up in 1999. Since then, Blair has obsessively filled the bus with his automata creations, donated curios and personal memorabilia. Winding handles and pushing buttons will bring them to life. Free admission. If the bus tickles your brain, you’ll have a hell-of-a-good-time in The Winding Thoughts Theatre (of Sorts). Buy your tickets in the bus. Visit the Bus Coffee & Cakes Grab a coffee at the Little Rocket The must-have break on your road trip, here at the quirky coffee cart in The Catlins. Take a bite from Carol’s homemade bakeries and spoil your eyes with Lost Gypsy treasures. Sipping from the best coffee in town, in a beautiful mosaic courtyard. Trust me, it can’t get much more authentic than this. Grab a Coffee About Rewarding the curious since 1999 Hello! This is us, the artists behind The Lost Gypsy. Blair Somerville came to Papatowai over two decades ago. He’s the tinkerer, the fiddler, the maker of movement. The Lost Gypsy is his life project, and almost all that you see is by his hand. His (now) fiancée, Sandra van der Sommen, came to meet Blair in 2018, and it was love at first sight. She draws and paints, and generally tries to raise the standard of the place. If you want to know more about us & how the Lost Gypsy came about, check out the button below. The Artists Recommended by

name: allieshilltophaven.co.nz
homepage_content: Bed & Breakfast Whanganui - Allie's Hilltop Haven +64 27 4845 468 info@allieshilltophaven.co.nz A Home Away From Home Bed & Breakfast  Whanganui  2 Rms, 6 Guests  Breakfast Book Now About Us Allie’s Hilltop Haven Allie’s HillTop Haven enjoys stunning views of Whanganui’s countryside and the sea from generously proportioned and sunny bedrooms. Complimentary continental breakfast is available to all guests, and served in the dining room. Both rooms are in their own wing with lovely a garden available for use. Allie is happy for you to bring your well behaved pooch! Room 1 Downstairs room is warm and sunny and very accessible to those who don’t like stairs. View This Room Room 2 The upstairs room has the floor all to themselves. Is a very sunny room with semi rural outlook & sea views from the landing. View This Room Garden Relaxing Relax and enjoy the beautiful garden and tranquility, a morning coffee or maybe an evening glass of New Zealand wine. Things to do Whanganui is quite beautiful, set on an amazing river. Only a 5 minute to the town center with many other activities available in the area. See here for some inspiration. Reviews Guest Reviews Allie’s HillTop haven is the perfect place to stay for a visit to Whanganui a small West Coast rural town in the central North Island. The rooms are well set up, large with modern decor, cumfy beds, and a selection of good pillows and the room was very clean. Our room had its own self contained bathroom which was excellent. The advertised breakfast is very tasty and healthy with fresh fruit, home made bread and quality filtered coffee. The host Allie is most helpful and keen to make your stay a pleasure. Graeme Wooller Enjoyed peaceful night in a clean comfortable b&b. Allie is a friendly helpful & knowledgeable host thank you. Bruce McCulloch Great place to stay for the night. Awesomely clean and tidy. Great host. Trip type Friends Rooms 5.0 Location 4.0 Service 5.0 Andrew Gracie Great location and facilities. Very welcoming hostess. name: westportholidaypark.co.nz
homepage_content: +64-03-789-7043 westportholidaypark@xtra.co.nz Menu We guarantee the best rate when booking online Our holiday park is only 5 streets from the main street of Westport and is set in 12 acres of native bush, with park-like grounds and abundant birdlife. We are the closest Holiday Park to the town centre of Westport, which is only a 2 minute drive or 10-15 minutes to walk to. We have a wide variety of accommodation from modern Studio and 2 bedroom Motels to En-suite and Standard Chalets and with spacious tenting areas and level, hard based powered sites. You will find our rooms quiet, clean, private, spacious and relaxing. We have a large amenities block adjacent to a covered BBQ area and a playground near by, all designed to sit back relax and enjoy during your stay for individuals, families and large groups. At the front of the Holiday Park we have a unique mini golf course which is themed on the local Buller District and places of interest. Full booking services for all local attractions and activities are available in the office. name: aromaindia.co.nz
homepage_content: Aroma India Greytown Restaurant & Takeaway Welcome To Aroma India Greytown Open 6 Days from Tuesday to Sunday ORDER ONLINE BOOK TABLE Welcome To Aroma India Greytown Best place for Family and Friends ORDER ONLINE BOOK TABLE Welcome To Aroma India Greytown Pop in to see the restaurant in action and pick-up your orders ORDER ONLINE BOOK TABLE THE BEST TRADITIONAL INDIAN RESTAURANT Pick Up Delivery Table Booking AROMA OUR DELICIOUS FOOD AT YOUR HOME Check our Menu Who We Are About Us My wife and I have worked in the hospitality industry for many years. We opened in Greytown in 2015 and focused on providing a friendly, welcoming atmosphere in which our diners can enjoy our fabulous food served by our knowledgeable staff. We then opened Aroma India Silverstream in January 2018 and Aroma India Martinborough in July 2021. Our Food We serve innovative, fresh meals cooked to order which is why you sometimes have to wait for your meals to be ready. We mix our own spices in-house rather than using ready-mixed packets to help contribute to the freshness of our food. We also make our own paneer in-house as you will be able to tell from the âsqueaksâ it makes when you eat it. All of these factors contribute to the âAroma India flavourâ. Private Function Over the years, we have seen many celebrations and we are happy to cater to large groups and allow the restaurant to be decorated within reason. If you are bringing young children that need to be given something to eat quickly, please us know and we will do our best to help you to get them settled so that you can all enjoy your evening. ORDER ONLINE NOW Customer Reviews Listen to what our customers say about us Karen âWe LOVE Aroma India. The food is always fabulous and the service friendly. The restaurant has a nice modern feel to it and does not feel crowded even when full. We are never hurried when we are there and feel that we can take our time eating. Although Iâm not a vegetarian, some of my favourite dishes are the paneer, the mushrooms and the dal makhani. I also love the Hariayala Murgh. The portions are a good size, particularly the biryanis. The chefs are very approachable and happy to show-off the kitchen.â Rob ââComing from the UK and being local in Greytown, we were very excited about a new Indian Restaurant in our town. When we tried it and found it to be consistently the best curry in New Zealand, we were blown away. We can definitely recommend our favourite dishes which are Hariayala Murgh and Malabari Fish.â Chris âWith the arrival of âAromaâ, Greytown can now boast as having the best Indian Restaurant in the Lower North Island. The ambience and style is warm and inviting, the staff always attentive friendly and happy. The menu is wide and varied but must-try dishes are the Garlic Chicken Tikka, the Hariayala Murgh, Lamb Masala and the Chicken Korma. After several visits, itâs always a great feeling that the staff recognise you and always make you feel special. Dining-in or taking-out, nothing is an issue, and home delivery is always a massive bonus on cold winter nights!! â Maureen âOne of the best Indian restaurants in the Wellington region. My husband and I go there several times a month for lunch or dinner as the menu is extensive, authentic, and the staff is exceedingly friendly and attentive. Dishes can be made to-order and Aroma has one of the best combination of spices, sauces, and fresh ingredients. An added bonus, we have taken our young Grandchildren there on occasion and they too are made to feel equally welcome. I highly recommend Aroma for anyone wanting a great Indian meal!â Colin âBefore dining at aroma india Iâd had Indian food half-a-dozen times but found its a little dry and not to my taste. We moved to Greytown 2 years ago and my wife asked me to try Aroma India. I found the restaurant to be clean and inviting, and the owner and staff pleasant and eager to chat. I now love Indian food â itâs always fresh and very tasty. My favourite is their chicken khorma (medium) with their delicious garlic naan. We like to eat there once a week. The first time we went there we asked for ice in our wine â strange but true! The second time they remembered us and asked if we would like ice! AMAZING! GREAT STAFF, GREAT FOOD.â Chelle âAroma has added some delicious spice to our life! We love trying something new each visit and appreciate being able to specify the level of spice. The hariyala murgh is delicious.â Previous Next LOCATION 74-76 Main Street, Greytown 5712, New Zealand 06 304 8080 069298209 aromaindia38@gmail.com Phone 06 304 8080, 069298209 Email aromaindia03@gmail.com Location 74-76 Main Street, Greytown 5712 ↑

name: auckland.vocohotels.com
homepage_content: Mozzarella & Co. | Breakfast & Lunch | voco™ Auckland City Centre Auckland's premier Italian trattoria Kick start your day the right way with a hearty à la carte breakfast, local seasonal fruit, freshly-brewed barista coffee or freshly squeezed juice. Then catch up on the morning news at our ground floor trattoria Mozzarella & Co. Lunch and dinner feature authentic Italian artisan fired pizzas and classic pasta dishes, championing locally-sourced seasonal produce. Enjoy mouthwatering cuisine from morning to night, with European flavours perfectly complemented with local ingredients, perfect for every occasion. Daily from 6:30AM to 10PM BOOK NOW CALL +64 9 883 2999 WHAT'S ON Mozzarella & Co. Menus BREAKFAST LUNCH/DINNER DESSERT BEVERAGE A Taste of Italian Classics and Local Flavours BOOK A TABLE × × Quick Enquiry Accommodation Requirements Yes No Where did you hear about us Google Social Media Other Search Engines Link from Another Website Email Advertisement Referral Prior Guest Other Δ × COVID-19 and Our Clean Promise At voco™ Auckland City Centre, the safety and well-being of our guests and colleagues is our top priority, which is why we’re expanding our commitment to cleanliness. Our Clean Promise is a new set of hygiene procedures made to redefine cleanliness and help support your wellbeing throughout your stay. To keep our guests safe, our hotel experience may also feel a little different with new hygiene protocols, social distancing measures and dining restrictions in place. These measures adhere to current government guidelines and public health advice. We encourage all guests planning to stay with us to regularly check the QLD government website for information on where you can and cannot travel. We thank you again for your understanding and continued support. Please know we will be providing continuous updates as required. Good isn’t good enough – we’re committed to high levels of cleanliness. That means clean, well maintained, clutter-free rooms that meet our standards. If this isn’t what you find when you check-in, then we promise to make it right. × Reserve your seat Please fill all the required fields. Great place, great location · vida badiee · January 2025 Best location and amazing views! Our family had an unforgettable two week stay at the house over the Christmas/New Year holidays. The homes location is a short walk to town, right on the walking/bike path and steps away from the lake for an early morning cold plunge. The views from the home are amazing. The property management company was on top of everything and responded to all communication in a very timely manner. We had a wonderful time! · Patty Wehr · November 2024 The Crew in New Zealand We have a group of 9 friends who travel together and this was our first stay in Queenstown. Needless to say, Lake Joella was the most amazing place to stay. We couldn’t get over the views from all sides and took way too many photos out the various picture windows. Great location and has all the necessary amenities for cooking. We were met by our host when we arrived and she toured us through to make sure we knew where everything was and how it operated. Very helpful and appreciated! We will dream about coming back! homepage_content: Came Lot Motor Lodge – Came Lot Motor Lodge Book Now! 06 3554141 Accommodation for weekend getaways and corporate conference facilities Located in Central Palmerston North Rooms & Suites Wild Beauty In The Perfect Location Explore Relax & Rejuvenate With SPA Facilities Discover Treatments Check in date Check out date Request a quote WELCOME Camelot Motor Lodge & Conference Centre is your Palmerston North motel accommodation home away from home Camelot Motor Lodge & Conference Centre provides spacious and comfortable motel accommodation in central Palmerston North for families and solo travellers on holiday, couples on a romantic getaway, or to professionals visiting for business. Our recently refurbished conference facilities offer the perfect venue for weekday business meetings and longer conferences – with convenient onsite accommodation if required. Enjoy a relaxing stay while exploring the best of what Palmerston North has to offer. Accommodation Camelot Motor Lodge & Conference Centre offers a range of accommodation in Palmerston North from single studios to two bedroom apartments. Whether you are a solo traveller or need family accommodation, we can assist. We also offer wheelchair accessible accommodation with a ground floor unit. When you need central accommodation in Palmerston North, book at Camelot Motor Lodge. Conferences From a half day business meeting to a five day conference, Camelot Motor Lodge & Conference Centre offers conference room hire at competitive rates. Our refurbished private conference facilities accommodates up to 40 people, and is available from 8am-5pm on weekdays with onsite parking and optional catering services. Attractions Camelot Motor Lodge & Conference Centre is conveniently located less than 1km from The Square and is close to many attractions including public gardens, mini golf, museums, galleries, shops, restaurants and more. Stay with us and we are happy to advise you on things to do in Palmerston North. Book Now&Save Book your stay online and secure your summer vacations on time with an amazing discount! name: decksofpaihia.co.nz
homepage_content: Paihia Bed and Breakfast Accommodation - Bay of Islands NZ Find out more Luxury Boutique Accommodation in Paihia, Bay of Islands Decks of Paihia offers purpose built boutique luxury bed and breakfast accommodation in our comfortable home. The property has undergone a stylish refurbishment in July 2020. Set on the hill in a secluded sunny north facing position, overlooking central Paihia and the immediate Bay. Daily breakfast is included in your rate and is served in our communal guest dining room with views overlooking the bay. Beautiful sun-drenched decks offer several vantage points to enjoy the vista. In ground swimming pool located outside the guest rooms offers a sunny, private and secluded area to relax and enjoy the solitude and beautiful bird life in the adjacent native bush. Decks of Paihia is also only a couple of minutes’ drive from the centre of Paihia and the wharf and maritime area. An easy downhill stroll will have you in the village centre in 10 minutes. All guest rooms have ensuite bathrooms and are stylishly furnished for maximum comfort . Refurbished to a high standard in July 2020 . Email Us: info@decksofpaihia.com Tel: +64 9 402 6146 or +64 21 278 7558 or +64 21 030 4427 FREE WIFI DAILY BREAKFAST INCLUDED GUEST POOL CENTRAL LOCATION Meet Your Hosts Phil and Wendy Hopkinson have been living in the Bay of Islands for 27 years, moving north from Auckland in 1994. At this time we designed and built a backpackers lodge which we operated successfully until 2001. Our love of travelling and swapping stories with our guests enabled us to meet some wonderful people and has led us to develop and build our new home containing boutique guest accommodation. We opened Decks of Paihia in 2005 and we love to share our home and extensive knowledge of Northland and New Zealand with those who come to stay. We look forward to your visit. Both Phil and Wendy are fully vaccinated against Covid-19 and would respectfully request that our guests are also. – Phil and Wendy Phil & Wendy are happy to offer complimentary transport to/from Paihia village if you are travelling without a car. Transfers to/from Kerikeri Airport are available with the local taxi shuttle services. We recommend Super Shuttles . Facebook Instagram LinkedIn Pinterest

name: jetcharmbarbershop.co.nz
homepage_content: Jetcharm - Jetcharm Barbershop and Cafe Facebook Instagram 06 758 8840 32 Egmont St, CBD, New Plymouth Contact BOOK NOW 0 Items } Barbershop Hours Monday 9-5pm Tuesday/Wednesday/Friday 9-6pm Thursday 9-7:30pm Saturday 8-4pm Sun 10-3 } Cafe Hours Monday-Friday 7.30-4pm Saturday 8-4pm Sun closed  FREE SHIPPING for orders over $60 Jetcharm Merch Available Shipping NZ only BOOK NOW SERVICES cuts Our barbers are fully trained and passionate about their trade and at the cutting edge of men’s hair styling. If you are looking for that brand new hairstyle whether it be a high fade quiff haircut, messy undercut, modern slicked back pompadour with tapered fade, crew cut or textured top with zero fade sides, then come and see us. All cuts styled & finished off with the razor clean up & boxing out by the masters fades Our master barbers are all skilled in the art of the mean low fades, high fades, taper fades & zero fades beard trims Beards are the new six packs and its important to keep your beard under control, neat and straight. Styling your beard is as important as getting up each day and we are happy to help you choose the right style to suit your face. Whether its shaving or trimming with sharp precise lines near your cheek bones, keeping your beard short on the sides and fuller on the sides, we are here to discuss the right look for you, finally finishing off with our specialty beard oil we will have you sorted HOT TOWEL SHAVES There are a a lot of great things about our barbershop but one of the best parts of it is the traditional straight razor shave. Using the heat from the towels to soften up your beard & make the shave less irritating for the skin this classic ritual gets you the nicest closest comfortable shave and oh so stinking relaxing. The Hot Towel Shave was a lost art in Taranaki until we bought it back. Its an experience you must try at least once in your life if you call yourself a man. hot towel shaves There are a a lot of great things about our barbershop but one of the best parts of it is the traditional straight razor shave. Using the heat from the towels to soften up your beard & make the shave less irritating for the skin this classic ritual gets you the nicest closest comfortable shave and oh so stinking relaxing. The Hot Towel Shave was a lost art in Taranaki until we bought it back. Its an experience you must try at least once in your life if you call yourself a man. view about us View our merchandise ABOUT US Pure Excellence Our Barbershop is a Barbershop offering the Royal Treatment from the moment you walk through the door to your departure. We specialise in old-style techniques using modern tools – from razor-fades, straight edge razor shaves, beard trims, patterns & braids/fades. Our barbers have a passion for male grooming and cutting edge trends. Our Barbershop is a great place to get a haircut, shop for the latest products or generally come and hang. Before, during or after your cut you can grab a coffee/healthy snack from our Barbershop Café. We offer Wedding Packages (including breakfast/beers) so the boys can be pampered and look sharp for their special day. Our main focus is on tight fades inspired by the refined men’s styles of the 1920’s and 40’s however our barbers are capable of creating cuts from that edgy freestyle cut to that of the rockabilly style . Our shop pulses with warm energy and you’ll always hear a chorus of people speaking to one another with furious excitement. We pride ourselves on being part of the local community; taking an active interest in what’s going on locally and engaging our social conscience. Whether it be a regular trim or a free style cut, click the book now button to book yourself in. We got you on this!!! OUR TEAM Barber Lachie Barber Lachie is our boy wonder and Barbershop Manager. Lachie completed his apprenticeship with us in December 2017. Lachie not only produces great work he is community minded and frequently giving his time for good causes such as gala days, school balls, surf life-saving events to name but a few. Lachie has won various national awards including the beard trim competition in the apprentice division of Barbercraft in 2017 & the Hair and Barber New Zealand People’s Choice and Classic Cut Awards in 2022. Facebook Twitter BARBER JOEY Barber Joey is originally from and trained in the Philippines Barber & comes to us with the sweetest likeable and eager to please personality. Joey has mastered the art of beard trimming, hot towel shaves, style cuts and patterns. Joey always goes the extra mile to ensure his clients are beaming with joy when they walk out the door. Facebook Twitter Barber Chris Barber Chris is a senior barber originally from the UK who joined us in February 2022. Chris is a friendly confident chap with a likeable personality and a flair for barbering. Chris will give you a charming experience that will have you wanting to come back for more. One of Chris’ best attributes is his concern for and desire to help people less privileged than himself be it by helping to feed the homeless or bringing about community awareness to social issues via his weekly Radio Show on Tuesday mornings (9-10am) with the Most FM. Can’t leave off the fact that Chris is absolutely brilliant in dealing with toddlers and youth haircuts. Facebook Twitter Barber Toby Barber Toby commenced his apprenticeship with us February 2022. Toby has a passion for barbering and is always looking for the next best thing in barbering. Don’t mistake Toby’s quietness for lack of interests as Toby is a very deep thinker and knowledgeable on lots of things including local music. In his spare time you will find Toby either practicing for or playing gigs in his band “Greenbathing”. Facebook Twitter Barber Jordan Barber Jordan is originally from Whangarei & comes to us as a senior barber having been cutting for over 6 years. Jordan is passionate about his craft, loves a challenge & will without a doubt exceed your expectations everytime. Jordan is a family man who dotes on his 3 beautiful children. Jordan has the gift of the gab, flair, diligence and a willingness to please which is sure to impress you. Facebook Twitter Barber George Barber George & Louis are identical twins and both starting working for Jetcharm in 2018 as young Francis Douglas school boys sweeping floors. George & Louis have both been trained in the skills of barbering by Lachie and our other senior barbers over the last few years and now bring their huge personalities along with their honed barbering to skills to Jetcharm in the uni holidays where they are currently studying business/commerce. George is an absolute delight to have in the shop with his easy going entrepreneurial nature and willingness to please Facebook Twitter Barber Louis Barber Louis & George are identical twins and both starting working for Jetcharm in 2018 as young Francis Douglas school boys sweeping floors. Louis & George have both been trained in the skills of barbering by Lachie and our other senior barbers over the last few years and now bring their huge personalities along with their honed barbering to skills to Jetcharm in the uni holidays where they are currently studying business/commerce. Louis has the biggest smile & heart and will make sure you receive nothing but the Royal Treatment at Jetcharm. Facebook Twitter view about us View our merchandise Healthy Smoothie Bowls Healthy smoothie bowls topped with homemade granola and fresh fruit/ Protein shakes/smoothie drinks V/GF Available Our Barbershop Download our own free ‘Jetcharm Barbers’ App so you can join the walk-in queue from anywhere or make an advance future booking. Weddings Exclusive use of our barbershop for your special day – packages available with or without breakfast/beers. Wedding photographers welcome. Loyalty Coffee – pay upfront for 10 coffees & receive 11th coffee free. Barber Services – pay for 10 services & receive 11th service free CONTACT  32 Egmont St New Plymouth v Phone: 06 758 8840 essay writing  jetcharm2@hotmail.co.nz Name Phone Number Email Address Message Submit Think Jetcharm for your Special Day find out more Copyright © – Jetcharm Barber Shop & Gentleman’s Quarters All Rights Reserved

name: lakeviewchalets.co.nz
homepage_content: Escape from it all at the Calm & Tranquil Lake View Chalets Skip to content Home lakeviewchalet1117 2025-02-20T10:09:07+13:00 Sorry. We Are Closed. Escape from it all at the calm and tranquil Lake View Chalets Located on the Private Slipper & Spectacle Lakes at Te Arai Point, Northland, New Zealand. Only 80 minutes north of Auckland Located in the private Spectacle & Slipper Lake Valley. Our Chalets are nestled in park-like grounds with superb views over the lakes, forest and countryside. Our chalet residents have exclusive access to the lake for water activities and walking and relaxing. All our fully serviced chalets enjoy a setting amongst native trees with spectacular views of the lakes and beyond. Each chalet has decks opening onto our extensive gardens with barbecues for each chalet. Enjoy the fabulous sunrise and sunsets with the peace and quite of our private lakes surrounded by the beauty of our local fauna and flora. A five minute drive away from our accommodation you find the beautiful Mangawhai and Pakiri Beaches separated by Te Arai Point, a rock formation extending into the sea that gives you stunning views over ocean, islands and beyond. Lake View Chalets are family friendly and ideal for Reunions, Weddings, Retreats, Events and Conferences too. Our chalets are fully serviced. Providing you with 2 separate bedrooms (super king or king single beds) modern fully equipped kitchen, a tastefully furnished spacious open living area and well-appointed bathrooms with showers. Lake View Chalets have been rated a four star facility by the New Zealand Tourism Board under their Qualmark rating system. Visit us and enjoy Northland’s best kept secret only 80 minutes from Auckland BRING YOUR HORSE Ride along the lake. We provide grazing and wash-down facilities for guest horses for a small charge. WATER SKIING Water sports to enjoy on the lake. Wind Surfing & Sail Boarding. Contact us about bringing your boat. KAYAK ON THE LAKE The calm lakes are easy to explore in our kayaks, and offer opportunities for walking and biking. EXPLORE THE BEACH Stroll the sandy beaches & splash in the surf just minutes away at Mangawhai, Te Arai & Pakiri. Enjoy the calm serenity of the lakes and valley, stroll the sandy beaches and splash in the surf just minutes away at Te Arai Point, Pakiri and Mangawhai Beaches. The calm lakes are easy to explore in our kayaks, while the forest and beaches offer you opportunities for walking and biking. Lake View Chalets are family friendly and ideal for Reunions, Weddings, Retreats, Events and Conferences too. Mangawhai Village, a short drive away, satisfies the espresso, art and shopping lover also providing access to surfing Lessons, fishing charters and the local golf club course! Find Out More About Mangawhai Page load link Go to Top

name: ktcinn.co.nz
homepage_content: KTC Motels Luxury Hotel Experience A unique experience where to stay Luxury Hotel Experience A truly immersive relax place Luxury Hotel Experience The experience of unique holidays About us Personalized service and the thrill of unique trips Welcome to KTC Motels Limited At KTC Motels Limited, we are dedicated to providing an exceptional and unforgettable stay for every guest. Established with a vision to offer comfort, convenience, and unique holiday experiences, KTC Motels has become a trusted name in the hospitality industry. Our Mission Our mission is to deliver tailored services that meet the diverse needs of our guests, ensuring a memorable stay every time. We are committed to providing high-quality accommodations, personalized customer service, and a welcoming atmosphere that makes every guest feel at home. Our Values Customer-Centric Approach: We place our guests at the heart of everything we do. Our team is trained to anticipate and exceed your expectations, ensuring a seamless and enjoyable stay. Quality and Comfort: We prioritize the comfort and satisfaction of our guests by maintaining high standards of cleanliness, safety, and hospitality. Innovation and Improvement: We continuously seek to improve our services and facilities, embracing innovative solutions to enhance the guest experience. Luxury Hotel Experience Enjoy in a very Immersive Relax Featured Our Motels From $120/night City Court 81 Queens Drive, 9810 Invercargill, New Zealand Read more KTC Motels Main Facilities Private Parking Enjoy the convenience of our private parking facilities, available exclusively for guests. Our secure parking area ensures your vehicle's safety, allowing you to relax and explore with peace of mind. Reserve your spot today for a hassle-free stay. High Speed Wifi Stay connected with our high-speed WiFi, available throughout the property. Whether you're working, streaming, or browsing, our reliable internet service ensures a seamless online experience. Enjoy fast and secure connectivity during your stay, free of charge. Kitchen Facilities Experience the convenience of our fully equipped kitchen facilities, perfect for preparing meals just the way you like. Each kitchen is stocked with modern appliances and utensils, providing you with the freedom and flexibility to cook and dine comfortably during your stay. Smart TV & Netflix Enjoy entertainment at your fingertips with our Smart TVs featuring Netflix access. Stream your favorite shows and movies in high definition directly from your room. Experience ultimate relaxation and entertainment during your stay with us. Unwind Enjoy Delight Travel Adventure Discover Unwind Enjoy Delight Travel Adventure Discover Unwind Enjoy Delight Travel Adventure Discover Unwind Enjoy Delight Travel Adventure Discover Local Amenities Restaurants Near Invercargill, you can find a variety of charming restaurants offering diverse culinary experiences. From the cozy ambiance of The Batch Cafe to the seafood delights at Buster Crabb, there's something to suit every palate. Blue River Dairy is renowned for its local dairy products, while Zookeepers Cafe provides a welcoming atmosphere with its delicious menu options. Whether you're craving comfort food or gourmet cuisine, these restaurants promise to enhance your dining experience in Invercargill. Local Amenities Art & Culture Discover local amenities near Invercargill, New Zealand, offering convenience and comfort during your stay. Explore charming cafes, bustling markets, scenic parks, and cultural attractions just moments away from our location. Ideal for leisurely outings and exploration of the vibrant local community. Testimonials What Customer's Says Sarah J. Auckland, New Zealand "Staying at KTC Motels was an absolute delight! The room was impeccably clean, and the staff went above and beyond to ensure our comfort. The location was perfect for exploring the local area. We will definitely be returning!" John L. Wellington, New Zealand "I had a wonderful experience at KTC Motels. The amenities were top-notch, especially the high-speed Wi-Fi and the well-equipped kitchen facilities. It made our stay feel just like home. Highly recommend it to anyone visiting Invercargill." Emma R. Christchurch, New Zealand "KTC Motels exceeded all our expectations. The private parking was a huge plus, and the room's smart TV with Netflix provided great entertainment. The staff was friendly and helpful throughout our stay. We'll be back for sure!" We are committed to providing high-quality accommodations, personalized customer service, and a welcoming atmosphere that makes every guest feel at home. Our Values Customer-Centric Approach: We place our guests at the heart of everything we do. Our team is trained to anticipate and exceed your expectations, ensuring a seamless and enjoyable stay. Quality and Comfort: We prioritize the comfort and satisfaction of our guests by maintaining high standards of cleanliness, safety, and hospitality. Innovation and Improvement: We continuously seek to improve our services and facilities, embracing innovative solutions to enhance the guest experience. Luxury Hotel Experience Enjoy in a very Immersive Relax Featured Our Motels From $120/night City Court 81 Queens Drive, 9810 Invercargill, New Zealand Read more KTC Motels Main Facilities Private Parking Enjoy the convenience of our private parking facilities, available exclusively for guests. Our secure parking area ensures your vehicle's safety, allowing you to relax and explore with peace of mind. Reserve your spot today for a hassle-free stay. High Speed Wifi Stay connected with our high-speed WiFi, available throughout the property. Whether you're working, streaming, or browsing, our reliable internet service ensures a seamless online experience. Enjoy fast and secure connectivity during your stay, free of charge. Kitchen Facilities Experience the convenience of our fully equipped kitchen facilities, perfect for preparing meals just the way you like. Each kitchen is stocked with modern appliances and utensils, providing you with the freedom and flexibility to cook and dine comfortably during your stay. Smart TV & Netflix Enjoy entertainment at your fingertips with our Smart TVs featuring Netflix access. Stream your favorite shows and movies in high definition directly from your room. Experience ultimate relaxation and entertainment during your stay with us. Unwind Enjoy Delight Travel Adventure Discover Unwind Enjoy Delight Travel Adventure Discover Unwind Enjoy Delight Travel Adventure Discover Unwind Enjoy Delight Travel Adventure Discover Local Amenities Restaurants Near Invercargill, you can find a variety of charming restaurants offering diverse culinary experiences. From the cozy ambiance of The Batch Cafe to the seafood delights at Buster Crabb, there's something to suit every palate. Blue River Dairy is renowned for its local dairy products, while Zookeepers Cafe provides a welcoming atmosphere with its delicious menu options. Whether you're craving comfort food or gourmet cuisine, these restaurants promise to enhance your dining experience in Invercargill. Local Amenities Art & Culture Discover local amenities near Invercargill, New Zealand, offering convenience and comfort during your stay. Explore charming cafes, bustling markets, scenic parks, and cultural attractions just moments away from our location. Ideal for leisurely outings and exploration of the vibrant local community. Testimonials What Customer's Says Sarah J. Auckland, New Zealand "Staying at KTC Motels was an absolute delight! The room was impeccably clean, and the staff went above and beyond to ensure our comfort. The location was perfect for exploring the local area. We will definitely be returning!" John L. Wellington, New Zealand "I had a wonderful experience at KTC Motels. The amenities were top-notch, especially the high-speed Wi-Fi and the well-equipped kitchen facilities. It made our stay feel just like home. Highly recommend it to anyone visiting Invercargill." Emma R. Christchurch, New Zealand "KTC Motels exceeded all our expectations. The private parking was a huge plus, and the room's smart TV with Netflix provided great entertainment. The staff was friendly and helpful throughout our stay. We'll be back for sure!" name: littleturkishcafe.com
homepage_content: Little Turkish Cafe Skip to content New Menu Items Coming Soon! Auckland's Best Turkish Cuisine! 217 KARANGAHAPE ROAD, AUCKLAND Item added to your cart View cart Check out Continue shopping SERVING OVER 30 YEARS OF TURKISH FLAVOUR! I have been coming here for 20+ years. I live overseas now, and every time I visit Auckland I have to come back. The absolute best kebabs. The way the meat is marinated and cut is just perfect. Delicious. Rosa A go-to place for kebabs on K-road. Great value chicken kebab on rice with garlic yoghurt, a healthy salad with nice humus as a dressing. There are plenty of options for customisation, and the service is quick and efficient. Alex Marvelous service with stunning interior. My partner and I had lunch here and everything is 5/5. Highly recommended. Will return soon. Jayce I had an amazing experience at little Turkish cafe, Mahdi and surya were amazing help. Incredible experience best kebab I’ve ever had will recommend for all my friends and family. I love how the lamb is proper cuts of meat and not mince. Highly recommend incredible service. Vicey The vegetarian moussaka was out of this world. Awesome comfort food and the portion size was huge. I almost didn’t have room for baklava, which was delicious, too. A casual space to go have a satisfying meal. My friend got chicken skewers and commented they were cooked to perfection. S Stumbled across this awesome little cafe in Auckland during my weekend stay. We ordered the lamb on chips and a meatlovers pizza. The food was very good quality and tasted delicious. The pizza's are woodfired and it was perfectly done. The lamb on chips/lamb snack pack was also very tasty and filling. Thank you very much! Darlo This place is great. I got stuck in Auckland for a couple of weeks and was staying nearby - this place caught my eye so went in to try. Food was really great, very tasty and a great price. I enjoyed it so much i went back again a few nights later! Would recommend all to try it. Andrew This place has become my goto Turkish eatery. In my opinion the best lamb in Auckland and the rice is cooked so perfectly fluffy. The eatery is open late and I like to bring my friends here. The team is also very friendly. Dan Absolutely beautiful meals. We had the Lamb Shish Kebab and Mixed Platter . The lamb was perfect and so delicious. Both meals flavorsome and extremely enjoyable. We both so enjoyed our meals and our time at the little Turkish café. We will be making this a regular place to eat. The service was friendly, welcoming, flawless.3 Lynette Stumbled across this awesome little cafe in Auckland during my weekend stay. We ordered the lamb on chips and a meatlovers pizza. The food was very good quality and tasted delicious. The pizza's are woodfired and it was perfectly done. The lamb on chips/lamb snack pack was also very tasty and filling. Thank you very much! Dario Good service, AMAZING food. great selection of vegetarian options. the atmosphere is great, from intimate indoor seating to the outdoor K-Road aesthetic. good for groups, get a shisha and a feed! delicious and pretty much a K-Road icon. Sammy Click Here For More Google Reviews! Manukau Motor Lodge is just 20 km from Auckland city centre. The shops, cafes and restaurants of Manukau are a 5-minute walk away. It is 600 metres to the Rainbows End Theme Park. All accommodation includes a microwave, hairdyer, ironing facilities and ceiling fans. TV and tea and coffee are provided. Suites with spa bath, air conditioning are available. Guest laundry facilities are available at Manukau Motor Lodge Auckland. Free on-site car parking is included. Accommodation Studio Book Now Studio - Twin Book Now Studio - Executive Book Now Studio - Spa Book Now 1 Bedroom Book Now 1 Bedroom - Family Book Now 2 Storey 2 Bedroom Unit Book Now Ground Floor 2 Bedroom Book Now 1 bedroom Executive Spa Book Now Exec Spa Book Now

Privacy Policy

This privacy policy sets out how we use and protects any information that you give us when you use this website.
We are committed to ensuring that your privacy is protected. Should we ask you to provide certain information by which you can be identified when using this website, then you can be assured that it will only be used in accordance with this privacy statement.
We may change this policy from time to time by updating this page. You should check this page from time to time to ensure that you are happy with any changes.

What we collect

We may collect the following information:
name and job title
contact information including email address
demographic information such as postcode, preferences and interests

What we do with the information we gather

We require this information to understand your needs and provide you with a better service, and for the following reasons:
Internal record keeping.
We may use the information to improve our products and services.
We may periodically send promotional email about new products, special offers or other information which we think you may find interesting using the email address which you have provided,

to do this you need to opt in for this service.


We may contact you by email, phone, or mail.
We may use the information to customise the website according to your interests.

Security

We are committed to ensuring that your information is secure.To prevent unauthorised access or disclosure we have put in place suitable physical, electronic and managerial procedures to safeguard and secure the information we collect online.

How we use cookies

A cookie is an element of data that a website can send to your browser, which may then store it on your system. We use cookies in some of our pages to store your preferences and record session information. The information that we collect is then used to ensure a more personalized service level for our users. Please be assured though that your credit card number will not be saved for security reasons. You must type the credit card number each time you make a purchase.
You can adjust settings on your browser so that you will be notified when you receive a cookie. Please refer to your browser documentation to check if cookies have been enabled on your computer or to request not to receive cookies. As cookies allow you to take advantage of some of the Website's essential features, we recommend that you accept cookies. For instance, if you block or otherwise reject our cookies, you will not be able to book flights or use any products or services on the Website that require you to log-in.
This information is treated confidentially and will not be shared with anyone outside of the Company unless otherwise stated in this Privacy Policy. We will only use this information to make informed decisions regarding the purchase of online advertising.

Links to other websites

Our website may contain links to enable you to visit other websites of interest easily. However, once you have used these links to leave our site, you should note that we do not have any control over that other website. Therefore, we cannot be responsible for the protection and privacy of any information which you provide whilst visiting such sites and such sites are not governed by this privacy statement. You should exercise caution and look at the privacy statement applicable to the website in question.

Controlling your personal information

You may choose to restrict the collection or use of your personal information in the following ways:
We will not sell, distribute or lease your personal information to third parties unless we have your permission or are required by law to do so.
You may request details of personal information which we hold about you under the Data Protection Act 1998
If you believe that any information we are holding on you is incorrect or incomplete, please write to or email us as soon as possible, at the above address. We will promptly correct any information found to be incorrect. WatchMyRate

name: onematarestaurant.co.nz
homepage_content: Onemata Restaurant - Wynyard Quarter, Viaduct Waterfront, Auckland Downtown • Experience The diverse flavours of New Zealand food, cooked on the grill and wok. Experience Our People Menu What's On origins Contact Book New season menu coming soon. Visit our What’s On page to find out more. RICH FERTILE NEW ZEALAND SOIL Book a table 2025 HM AWARD new zealand hotel restaurant of the year We are proud to announce that Onemata has been awarded the New Zealand Hotel Restaurant of the Year at the Aotearoa and the South Pacific 2025 HM Awards . This recognition celebrates our commitment to showcasing the best of Aotearoa’s produce, crafted with passion and creativity by our talented culinary team. The HM Awards are among the most prestigious in the hospitality industry, honoring excellence across hotels and restaurants throughout Australasia. Winning this award is a testament to the dedication of our chefs, service team, and everyone who brings the Onemata experience to life every day. Our Upcoming Events at Onemata At Onemata we’re proud to celebrate the best of New Zealand food and wine, bringing you closer to the people, the lands, and the producers that make us unique. Join us in one of our upcoming events as we celebrate cuisine inspired by Aotearoa’s rich coastlines and abundant natural landscapes. See What's On Inspired by Aotearoa flavours of home Onemata is formed out of the passion and enthusiasm that our Chefs have for New Zealand, its plentiful fresh produce, premium farm meats and supreme seafood. Toasting to our rich coastlines and abundant landscapes, Onemata serves to bring people together, celebrating and savouring the best of New Zealand’s local produce. See our menu Kaitiakitanga. in the Onemata kitchen Kaitiakitanga, the preservation and guardianship of New Zealand’s environment, sits at the heart of making decisions for Onemata and the food we serve. We are proud to showcase what New Zealand has to offer and support these local producers. Small scale, natural production of these products allows complete focus on perfecting these ingredients, which make up the simple, sustainable foods served in Onemata. Our suppliers Our food ethos. KAI KAITIAKI Hand selecting only the freshest and most premium ingredients puts our local suppliers at the cornerstone of every dish. At Onemata, we welcome you into our kitchen to connect with our wider family, and experience the level of care and consideration that goes into every meal. Stories from our farmers, fisherman and butchers that Onemata shares with you right at your table. Our team have travelled the country, to find the creamiest buffalo cheese right here in neighbouring Clevedon, all the way down to Stewart Island to source the country’s finest freshly caught salmon. Meet our people Dining Options PRIVATE DINING At Onemata, we provide a unique dining experience designed for groups of up to 12 guests, allowing you to enjoy our diverse menu in an exclusive, private setting. Group Bookings Please click here for further information on group dining options. Please email onemata@hyatt.com or call if you would like to find out more info. Dietary Information & FAQ Reserve a table 99 Halsey St, Auckland 1010, New Zealand | +64 9 366 2500 | Opening Hours | T&C’s | Privacy Policy 99 Halsey St, Auckland 1010, New Zealand +64 9 366 2500 | Opening Hours T&C’s | Privacy Policy Join Newsletter Reserve a table Experience Our People Menu What's on origins Contact

name: sherwoodlodge8.wordpress.com
homepage_content: Sherwood Lodge – Unique treehouse-style accommodation with spectacular gardens and the best views in town. Visiting Christchurch? Stay somewhere truly unique! Pohutukawa icon by Joanne Lush from Noun Project SHERWOOD LODGE Like Nowhere Else You’ve Ever Stayed Views all the way across the city to the Southern Alps. Extensive native and subtropical gardens with private hillside paths. Native birdsong from kereru, bellbirds and piwakaka. Warm, cosy rooms with comfy beds and clean, new facilities. And even a real stream running through the property! Cosy Accommodation Warm in winter and cool in summer, you’ll always be cosy and comfortable. There are recently renovated bathroom and toilet facilities. Peaceful Surroundings Hillside plantings of native trees and sub-tropicals surround the house with natural beauty and birdsong. The song of running water from numerous water features adds to the serenity. Stunning Views Perched on a hillside above the city, Sherwood Lodge has some of the best views in town. Park and city views; stunning sunrises and sunsets; on a clear day you can even see the Southern Alps. What People Say I needed a relaxing break and Sherwood Lodge gave that to me. A clean and comfortable place to stay, with a lovely native garden outlook. It was quiet and relaxing, exactly what I needed for this getaway. Matt, New Zealand Stayed July, 2023 sherwood lodge A Holiday Home Like No Other Relax and unwind in style, staying in your very own architecturally-designed four-bedroom treehouse. Guests have access to the full property with no hosts on site and no shared spaces. What People Say Petite havre de paix. A little haven in the middle of the trees for a quiet stopover in Christchurch! Decorated with great taste! Claire, France Stayed April, 2023 HOW TO BOOK Fast, safe, online confirmation At Sherwood Lodge, we like to give our guests options. So, no matter which website you prefer, we’re happy to accommodate you. Airbnb Book Now VRBO/Bookabach Book Now Booking.com Book Now Prefer to book directly? We currently offer direct booking only to guests who’ve already stayed with us or under special circumstances. Please click the “Contact Us” link below if you’d like to know more, or email us directly at sherwoodlodgenz@gmail.com What People Say Oasis in the city, very accommodating and comfortable! Incredible views and very comfy setup. Great value for money and a little oasis. Sad we didn’t stay long enough to try out the bathtub! Patricia, UK Stayed July, 2023 Want to know more? We’re always happy to answer questions! If you’d like to know more about Sherwood, if you have enquiries about using the property for special events or if you’d like to enquire about booking directly, please contact us using the button below. Contact Us Privacy & Cookies: This site uses cookies. By continuing to use this website, you agree to their use. To find out more, including how to control cookies, see here: Cookie Policy Loading Comments... Write a Comment... homepage_content: The Grand by SkyCity - The Grand by SkyCity In the heart of the city, is a sanctuary. A lavish hideaway resting high above the bustling night life of the city streets below. A place of understated luxury, bursting with warmth, where those seeking excitement can revel in the elegant sophistication of this uniquely intimate refuge. Here is where opulence and elegance meet. A lavish hideaway resting high above the bustling night life of the city streets below. Perched at the top of the Sky Tower, Orbit celebrates the best of New Zealand’s seasonal produce.... From fresh seafood to decadent desserts, there’s something for everyone!... Andy's Burgers & Bar Andy's is all about doing the simple things well. Nothing fancy, just great food, great beer and a great Kiwi vibe.... Food Republic Your passport to global flavours, all under one roof. A taste of Asia, India and Europe awaits you.... Information 1 - SHOW by SkyCity Be part of SHOW by SkyCity rewards and unlock more than the casino floor. Read more SkyCity Unlocked Save 10% on room rates, always Read more eGift vouchers Give the gift of lasting memories with a SkyCity Auckland eGift! Read more New Year's Eve Stay Tips Thanks for seeing in the new year with us, please read our New Years Eve stay tips. Read more Directions and information Whether you’ve stayed with us before, or are a first time guest, we look forward to your company. Read more The Terrace Your destination for breakfast. Read more East Day Spa An award-winning oasis of calm in the heart of Auckland CBD. Read more Is parking inclusive with accommodation? Some hotel packages or offers include parking, please check your confirmation for what is included in your booking. Parking options: Valet parking is available at a charge of NZ$60.00 per night for unlimited car retrievals. Self parking is available at a charge of NZ$35.00 per exit, a minimum of NZ$35 per day Short-term hotel guest parking (five hours or less) is available, please see the hotel Concierge for Super Saver parking rates. What are the breakfast options available for hotel guests? The breakfast restaurant for SkyCity Hotel and The Grand is The Terrace located on Level 7 of The Grand by SkyCity. For current pricing please visit The Terrace . There are other breakfast options at SkyCity. Please check with our team at check-in as to which restaurants are serving during your stay. What is the check-in and check-out time? Guaranteed check-in time starts from 3pm and check-out time is 11am. Can I please have an early check in or late check out? Our daily departure time is 11am. We would be more than happy to note a late check out request; however, please note that this is subject to availability and unfortunately cannot be confirmed until you arrive at the hotel. To guarantee a late check out, we would require you to book the night of your departure date. Can I leave my bags in storage after check-out? Yes, we can arrange baggage storage post check-out at the concierge’s desk without any charge. Please contact the concierge team after check-out. Can I book a group? Yes, we offer great rates for groups for any occasion. Groups booking less than 9 rooms: Email hotel.reservations@skycity.co.nz Groups booking 9+ rooms: Email hotelgroupreservations@skycity.co.nz Why choose us? Enjoy a dedicated account manager with local knowledge and recommendations to make your stay a memorable one Competitive rates for Hotel rooms and Breakfast add-ons Two first-class hotels to choose from to suit every guest and every budget When you stay with us, you have the very best of Auckland on your doorstep What are the terms and conditions of staying at either hotel? Terms and conditions of booking and staying can be found here . Why book direct and the best rate guarantee? Here are plenty of reasons to book directly with SkyCity Hotels. Availability Our website will have the last rooms that are available. If you're looking for last minute bookings then we'll have the rooms that other sites don't have access to. Book what you want The full range of rooms and packages is available on our site that you won't find elsewhere. Plus, if you need to add valet parking or breakfast you can do that right here too. Personalise your stay If you've got a special occasion to celebrate or are looking for something a little outside of the ordinary, then we can help you. From helping plan engagements to surprises with all the finer details, we can assist in making your moment an incredible one. Book now, pay as you leave SkyCity Auckland is a large entertainment destination and if you're staying in one of our hotels you'll find that you can charge some of your experiences with us to your room key card and pay at the end of your stay. That includes the Federal Street dining precinct, Sky Tower admissions and treatments at East Day Spa. Best online rate guarantee Booking a hotel room should be easy. If you have booked a room with us through skycityauckland.co.nz, then find a better online qualifying lower rate within 24 hours of making your booking, we want to know about it. And, we’ll beat the qualifying lower offer by 10%. Click here for all the details . What is SkyCity Hotels Unlocked? SkyCity Hotels Unlocked members can gain access to discounts and offers when booking direct to stay at the SkyCity Hotels. An email and a password is all that’s required to sign up. Find out more details here . You can be a SHOW by SkyCity Rewards member, and a SkyCity Unlocked member. Reward Points can be earned when hotel bookings are made via SkyCity Hotels Unlocked. Present your SHOW by SkyCity Rewards card upon check-out to get your Rewards Points. Do I need a card to play at SkyCity Casino? Yes. You must have a SHOW by SkyCity card or valid Premier Rewards card to play. This is part of SkyCity’s commitment to host responsibility and preventing financial crime. To support a safe and responsible gaming experience, all new customers a few more questions when they sign up and have the choice to opt-in to the SHOW by SkyCity Rewards programme. If a customer does not opt-in to the SHOW by SkyCity Rewards programme they can still complete enrolment and get a SHOW by SkyCity card to play. To learn more about what carded play is, please click here . SHOW by SkyCity Rewards members can earn Rewards Points, which you can redeem for exciting rewards. See more here . You can be a SHOW by SkyCity Rewards member, and a SkyCity Unlocked member. Reward Points can be earned when hotel bookings are made via SkyCity Hotels Unlocked. Present your SHOW by SkyCity Rewards card upon check-out to get your Rewards Points. 90 Federal Street Auckland 1010 New Zealand +64 9 363 6000 grandreservations@skycity.co.nz Instagram Facebook Trip Advisor SkyCity Unlocked Unlock great rates Loading... From $ 280 NZD Book now Share Pinterest Facebook Twitter Email

homepage_content: The Enchanted Retreat | African Safari: Meets 5-Star Opulence AFRICAN SAFARI MEETS 5-STAR OPULENCE The Enchanted Retreat  Havelock North, New Zealand  Luxurious Glamping Tent  5-Star Comfort Book Now About Us A GLAMPING EXPERIENCE UNLIKE ANY OTHER Discover a world where the enchanting essence of an African Safari tent meets 5-star sophistication, all nestled amidst the breathtaking views out across Havelock North, Hawkes Bay. Experience New Zealand’s unmatched natural beauty and indulge in the finest luxuries at our stunning, eco-friendly glamping retreat. Inspired by the captivating charm of a classic African safari tent, our 76 square meter tent is a sanctuary of opulence and adventure. The interior features an exquisite super king-sized bed adorned with deluxe linens, ambient lighting, and tasteful décor. A full kitchen and expansive bathroom with a walk in rain shower. Unwind in your private outdoor seating area, soak in your private cedar hot tub and marvel at the sweeping views of Hawkes Bay, a perfect backdrop for savoring a glass of local wine. Passionate about luxury comforts, while enjoying that magic feeling, found only when camping under the stars. We hope you enjoy your stay. Richard & Lucy, Your Hosts Discover ULTIMATE LUXURY Step into our luxurious African glamping tent and experience a world of elegance and comfort. Uniquely designed, this exclusive retreat is designed to blend seamlessly with the surroundings, offering an authentic yet lavish experience. Lose yourself in the soft embrace of sumptuous bedding, relax in the soothing waters of your cedar hot tub, and bask in the beauty of the starlit sky from the privacy of your own deck. View Availability Square Meters Sleeps 5-Star Reviews Opened In Stay at The Enchanted Retreat Imagine glamping elegance, where the allure of a 5-star experience mingles with the untamed beauty of the outdoors. Unwind on a plush, luxurious bed that promises nights of unparalleled comfort beneath the stars. But it’s not just the opulence that sets us apart – our retreat is thoughtfully designed with the latest in smart tent technology, ensuring your stay is seamless and connected. Let the symphony of rustling leaves and the soft hush of the wind lull you into relaxation. Here, you’ll discover the true magic of a getaway that marries sophistication with the wilderness, creating moments that linger in your memory. The gas fire added to the romance of the experience but there was also a heat pump to keep the chills at bay. Overall, highly recommended! What an experience! Jaimee Bennett ACCOMMODATION Information Amenities Free High-Speed WiFi Stay connected with the world, even while you’re nestled in nature Private Hot Tub Indulge in a relaxing soak, surrounded by nature’s serenity.
